alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Jackson; Lawrence; Meigs; Morgan; Vinton; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 2:41PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of Boyd, southeastern Greenup, southeastern Carter, Lawrence, Meigs, Washington, Morgan, Lawrence, Gallia, southeastern Jackson, southeastern Vinton, Athens, northwestern Putnam, northwestern Jackson, Wayne, Wood, west central Pleasants, Mason and Cabell Counties through 345 PM EST... At 240 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers along a line extending from 9 miles west of Caldwell to near Wrigley. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Parkersburg, Athens, Ashland, Marietta, Ironton, Belpre, Point Pleasant, Grayson, Gallipolis, Louisa, Coal Grove, Pomeroy, McConnelsville, Wayne, Beverly, Rio Grande, Albany, Chesapeake and Racine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 141 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 166 and 191. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 29. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Athens; Gallia; Jackson; Lawrence; Meigs; Morgan; Vinton; Washington
